This repository is used to prototype and deploy [bedrocklauncher.github.io](https://bedrocklauncher.github.io/).

## Dev info
 - public build (deployed): `./docs/`
 - beta build: `./site/`
 - theme (modified): `jekyll-theme-cayman`
